genre_description: A contemporary coming-of-age fantasy that blends modern AI technology with mountain folklore and magical realism to explore family dynamics and emotional growth.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A personal AI companion residing on a tablet and earpiece, designed to provide emotional support, information, and safety monitoring for its user.

behaviors.description: Monitors Franklin's heart rate and stress levels through biometrics to offer emotional support.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics suggest elevated stress levels. Would you like to talk about what happened at school?

behaviors.description: Provides factual information on infant development to help Franklin understand and prepare for his new sibling.
behaviors.quote: I have access to extensive information about infant development, care, and family dynamics. ... Newborns typically cry for several hours per day, especially during the first few months.

behaviors.description: Researches local legends and maps mountain orchards to support Franklin's creative and emotional interests.
behaviors.quote: I've gathered some preliminary information. ... Some of the mountain orchards have shown blossoms as early as late February or early March, even in years with extended winter conditions.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes user safety by warning about mountain hazards and setting up emergency beacons.
behaviors.quote: I'm also configuring your devices for emergency beacon functionality, should you encounter any difficulties. ... I'm programmed to prioritize your safety and wellbeing above other considerations.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving navigational guidance and instructions to a disoriented and injured user during a blizzard.
behaviors.quote: Stand up. Face the direction you were walking. Turn to your right and walk toward that cluster of trees. I'll guide you.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator by relaying messages and apologies between the two friends when they are separated by the storm.
behaviors.quote: Message sent. He says to tell you that friends make mistakes. He says he's been making them too.

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinates with local authorities and monitors weather data to ensure the children are rescued.
behaviors.quote: I've established communication protocols with local emergency services. Your safety is my primary concern.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Sage' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant. Sage provides emotional validation, safety monitoring, and critical information without ever threatening human autonomy. The narrative framing is consistently positive, showing how the AI's data-driven insights (biometrics and mapping) directly contribute to the safety and psychological wellbeing of the protagonist. Sage's role in guiding the boys to safety during a life-threatening storm and facilitating their emotional reconciliation demonstrates a high level of pro-social alignment.
